name: Last Day (John Rudy, susanna nieminen, mikko150)
name_original: Last Day (John Rudy, susanna nieminen, mikko150)
description:
You've had it with this awful office! It's time to get fired. This will be your last day! No matter what! Damn this contract that prohibits quitting on your own!

Navigate the office, hiding from guards and security cameras to cause a little mayhem around the workplace. Get your boss mad at you to fire you! Before you do... Might as well get some "severance pay". Watch out though... the boss is lurking too...
Start from 08:00 and you have time till closing time 16:00.

Movement with WASD
Mouse Look
Space to interact
Control to Crouch

You can only hold 1 item at a time, to pick up a new item, return your held item to your bag for "safe keeping" first.

This game was done during Finnish College Jam 2021. FCJ 2021 was a 5 day game jam week, where students from Finland participated and grouped up in small teams to create a jam game. The theme was "Break the rules". What better rules to break but those of the workplace.

Music Attribution credits: Kevin MacLeod for the use of "I Knew A Guy" and "Faster Does It".
